com.wegas.core.security.jparealm

Class JpaAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wegas.core.persistence.AbstractEntity
      • com.wegas.core.security.persistence.AbstractAccount
        • com.wegas.core.security.jparealm.JpaAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    @Entity
public class JpaAccount
extends AbstractAccount
    Simple class that represents any User domain entity in any application.
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aeberhard
